name: Wegaware
short_description: Wegaware is PHP web application that bring together CMS and CRM. This project bring the best of RoundCube, Joomla, Drupal, OpenCRM, Vtiger, and Bitweaver. With in the redesign we will look to confirm what works with low cost hosting providers.
